DataElement.preferredName: Age First Steroid Compound Use Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The first time a drug used to relieve swelling and inflammation was used by the participant.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The first time a drug used to relieve swelling and inflammation was used by the participant.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A group of polycyclic compounds closely related biochemically to TERPENES. They include cholesterol, numerous hormones, precursors of certain vitamins, bile acids, alcohols (STEROLS), and certain natural drugs and poisons. Steroids have a common nucleus, a fused, reduced 17-carbon atom ring system, cyclopentanoperhydrophenanthrene. Most steroids also have two methyl groups and an aliphatic side-chain attached to the nucleus. (From Hawley's Condensed Chemical Dictionary, 11th ed):Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

Compounds possessing the skeleton of cyclopenta[a]phenanthrene or a skeleton derived therefrom by one or more bond scissions or ring expansions or contractions. Methyl groups are normally present at C-10 and C-13. An alkyl side chain may also be present at C-17.  They include cholesterol, numerous hormones, precursors of certain vitamins, bile acids, alcohols (STEROLS), and certain natural drugs and poisons.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
